title: Patterns in Nature and Application to Design Quiz

questions.question: What is the significance of patterns in permaculture design?
choices: They provide efficient and resilient design solutions based on nature's wisdom
They are used to confuse pests
They have no practical application in design
questions.answer: They provide efficient and resilient design solutions based on nature's wisdom
